Brief

Idle Slice Tycoon Game is an intriguing mobile game for both casual and strategic players who enjoy idle mechanics and tycoon simulations. Step into the role of a slicing tycoon, building and optimizing a bustling business empire centered around slicing through various objects to discover treasures within.
